org.apache.james.mailetcontainer.lib

Class AbstractStateMailetProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.mailetcontainer.lib.AbstractStateMailetProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, LogEnabled, MailProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CamelMailetProcessor

    public abstract class AbstractStateMailetProcessor
extends Object
implements MailProcessor, Configurable, LogEnabled
    Abstract base class for MailProcessor implementations which want to process Mail via Matcher and Mailet

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AbstractStateMailetProcessor.MailetProcessorListener
      A Listener which will get notified after Mailet.service(org.apache.mailet.Mail) and Matcher.match(org.apache.mailet.Mail) methods are called from the container
      class  AbstractStateMailetProcessor.TerminatingMailet
      Mailet which protect us to not fall into an endless loop caused by an configuration error
